metadata.Plot: A distinguished English gentleman has a secret life--he is the notorious jewel thief the press has dubbed "The Amateur Cracksman". When he meets a woman and falls in love he decides to "retire" from that life, but an old friend comes to him with a predicament that entails him committing one last job.
metadata.Writer: E.W. Hornung, Sidney Howard, Eugene Wiley Presbrey
metadata.Actors: Ronald Colman, Kay Francis, David Torrence
metadata.Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. 2 wins & 1 nomination total
